dcterms:description: Collected from anonymized voice search queries, the UIDs dataset includes a full training partition (Train250k) with 249,312 speakers and 12,202,181 utterances, and a subset (Train50k) with 46,835 speakers and 2,236,379 utterances. The evaluation partition (Eva200) consists of 200 speakers that do not overlap with the training speakers.
dcterms:title: UIDs

dcterms:description: The Train250k dataset is a large subset of the UIDs dataset, comprising 249,312 speakers and 12,202,181 utterances, primarily used for training speaker recognition systems.
dcterms:title: Train250k

dcterms:description: The Train50k dataset is a smaller subset of the UIDs dataset, consisting of 46,835 speakers and 2,236,379 utterances, used for training speaker recognition systems.
dcterms:title: Train50k

dcterms:description: The Eva200 dataset is an evaluation partition of the UIDs dataset, consisting of 200 speakers that do not overlap with the training speakers, used for testing speaker recognition systems.
dcterms:title: Eva200

dcterms:description: The XiaoDu dataset contains Baidu wake-word utterances, specifically the phrases 'Xiaodu, xiaodu', used for text-dependent speaker recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: XiaoDu

dcterms:description: The MTurk dataset consists of scripted English utterances collected on Amazon Mechanical Turk, used for text-independent speaker recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: MTurk
